description: New parking area for motorhomes, an embankment without services, quite flat. In winter, if new, the snowplow or tractor also lowers. Toilets and containers at the ski resort, which is about 200 meters away.

title: (25793) Coll de Nargó - 100 C-14
description: Beautiful place in the Oliana swamp with magnificent views. Although the road can be heard a little, the place is quite quiet. There are trails that go down to the swamp. Be careful if it rains or has rained recently, without 4x4 the climb can be a bit complicated. Fits one or two AC / Vans in the area below. Upstairs fit up to 5 without bothering.

Please note that access from 'rasos de Peguera' is impossible (or large 4x4). beautiful calm and wild site, beautiful view from the top of the small hill nearby, possibility of hiking.

I do not know how to get tables outside, nor set up a camp since it is a public parking lot if you can park and sleep safely already covered. It is the parking of the tourist office where they report excursions, what to visit, activities and also come bread and there is a mountain tavern with views.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera -
description: Repsol gas station with truck parking and some smaller spaces for vans. attached to the road so there is noise from cars and trucks going by all the time.

title: (25794) Fígols - 21 Carrer de l'Església
description:
New parking 3 minutes from the small town of Fígols. It has a water fountain (no connection) and basic services in town.
Very nice and quiet.
Walking 2 minutes up the road there is a big rubbish bin and 5 minutes up the road you have recycling.
In the council house you can ask for the WiFi key. Next to it there is a space called "Lo Caliu" with toilets and snacks. If it is open you can get coffee, ice-cream and drinks (including beer) using an honesty box.

title: (25793) Coll de Nargó - L-511
description: Nice esplanade just 1 minute from the pots, the river passes by the side, about 8-10 vans fit, you have trees that provide you some shade.

title: (25747) Gualter - C-1412b
description:
Perfect place, very quiet. Amazing views of both the lake and the town behind. 

To get here you do need to traverse a dirt incline for about 15 meters. 

I managed it very easy in a small front wheel drive.  However for mobile homes it may be too difficult. 
Any small vans or sprinters ect should be fine without 4WD.

name: Càmping Molí de Fórnols
title: (25717) Càmping Molí de Fórnols
description: Great spot, next to RB 5 Vibraction. Bar and restaurant. And a nice swimming pool. Very quiet location and friendly owner.

title: (08280) Calaf - 16 Carrer Xuriguera

title: (25794) Organyà - Unnamed Road
description:
Dirt clearing at the end of a logging road. It is usually a parking lot for a canyoning route. without shadow. Space for 4 or 5 vehicles.
dirt road in good condition, only 300m. Suitable for any vehicle

title: (08618) Castellar del Riu -
description: Wonderful place in the middle of nature. It is about 2 kilometers of dirt road, but there is a very steep descent, with holes that I had a lot of trouble climbing with a small van. I left my wheels spinning and I was quite scared thinking I was going to crash. Only for very experienced or 4x4 drivers. I had a bad time. I won't repeat it again. Next time I will stay right in the upper area, which is nice (although there are usually people) but without surprises hehe

title: (25740) Ponts - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area next to the river, quieter than on the parking lot at 300 meters. Very nice view, possible walk along the river. Good tv reception.

title: (25210) Guissona -
description: Pou de glaç. bon lloc per pernoctar.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera - 4 BV 1033
description: Very large parking lot in front of the town hall. During the day the noise of the traffic of the C-25 is heard, at night it is more subtle. There is a restaurant next door, but it must be on weekends and there is a basketball basket in front of the social premises. No shade, but with nice wind. Containers only available to neighbors and no bins in the vicinity. All the wooded area without papers or samples of our passage through the place, keep it up. He passed the city hall van and didn't tell us anything. The GR7 passes through the town and the surroundings are flat, perfect for easy cycling. The climb to Castell de Boixadors, Durilla, about 500m of unevenness.

title: (25716) Gósol - Moli de Gosol, s/n
description: A very quiet place next to a shelter. Small, with the river next to it. A paradise. No services.

title: (08600) Berga - 10 BV-4242
description: Parking at the Sanctuary of Santa Maria de Queralt, without services. Ideal to visit the sanctuary, take the cable car on the same parking. Berga and spectacular views of Montserrat.

title: (08698) Fígols - BV-4025
description: Field and forest ideal to spend the night in the middle of quiet nature and point of departure for excursions to the Serra d'Ensija

title: (25717) - C-563
description: The parking lot of the hermitage remains in Sant Jaume de Tuixent halfway between Tuixent and Josa de Cadí. Very quiet with the river next to it.

title: (25740) Ponts - 1 Plaça Anton Castellà
description: New laundry near Ponts area

title: (25740) Ponts - 20 Carrer Molí
description: Open air parking close to the river. Very quiet place. Near a park with a lake and barbecues. There are a lot of parking spots and they are big, it’s never full. Free. To get there you have to go through de Cadí restaurant street and at the end turn left by the road, not the gravel trail.

title: (08697) Saldes - B-400
description: Plana del Reig picnic area (former Espà viewpoint). Perfect for spending the day and it can be done overnight. Very calm.

title: (25740) Ponts - 3 Plaça del Segre Mitjà
description: Drinking water

title: (25717) Sisquer -
description: Quiet free parking next to an almost impassable road. With very good views of Tossa Pelada. Ideal for a stop or to sleep, if you are in this beautiful and quiet area. Do not hesitate to stop by the artisans of the towns, such as in Ossera or Tuixent. And do not forget to approach the beautiful town of Josa.
